sections.original: Because I'm so empty

sections.original: Life.. has betrayed me once again
sections.spanish: La vida... me ha traicionado una vez más

sections.original: I accept that some things will never change.
sections.spanish: Acepto que algunas cosas nunca cambiarán.

sections.original: I've let your tiny minds magnify my agony
sections.spanish: He permitido que tus mentes diminutas magnifiquen mi agonía

sections.original: and it's left me with a chemical dependency for sanity.
sections.spanish: y me ha dejado con una dependencia química de la cordura.

sections.original: Yes, I am falling... how much longer 'till I hit the ground?
sections.spanish: Sí, me estoy desplomando... ¿cuánto falta hasta que toque el suelo?

sections.original: I can't tell you why I'm breaking down.
sections.spanish: No puedo decirte por qué me estoy derrumbando.

sections.original: Do you wonder why I prefer to be alone?
sections.spanish: ¿Te preguntas por qué prefiero estar solo?

sections.original: Have I really lost control?
sections.spanish: ¿Realmente he perdido el control?

sections.original: I'm coming to an end,
sections.spanish: Estoy llegando a mi fin,

sections.original: I've realized what I could have been.
sections.spanish: Me he dado cuenta de lo que podría haber sido.

sections.original: I can't sleep so I take a breath and hide behind my bravest mask,
sections.spanish: No puedo dormir, así que respiro y me oculto tras mi máscara de valor,

sections.original: I admit I've lost control
sections.spanish: Admito que he perdido el control

sections.original: Lost control...
sections.spanish: Perdido el control...

sections.original: The fragments of connection died
sections.spanish: Los fragmentos de conexión murieron

sections.original: Some things just won't fade with time
sections.spanish: Algunas cosas simplemente no se desvanecen con el tiempo

sections.original: Hide behind a transparent eye
sections.spanish: Escóndete tras un ojo transparente

sections.original: You can't see me but I can you...
sections.spanish: Tú no puedes verme pero yo sí a ti...

sections.original: Betray without a moment's thought
sections.spanish: Traiciona sin pensarlo un momento

sections.original: Regret nothing but getting caught
sections.spanish: No lamentes nada salvo ser descubierto

sections.original: Your time has come and here I stand
sections.spanish: Tu tiempo ha llegado y aquí estoy

sections.original: Why should I hold out my hand to you...
sections.spanish: ¿Por qué debería ofrecerte mi mano?

sections.original: I could never turn to you
sections.spanish: Nunca podría volverme hacia ti

sections.original: Silenced by that look in your eye
sections.spanish: Silenciado por esa mirada en tus ojos

sections.original: Feel I'm slipping back again

sections.spanish: ...agotado

sections.spanish: ¿Es hora de enfrentarme a mí mismo?

sections.original: And love dies in your eyes

sections.original: It's killing you, you're killing me

sections.original: I'm clinging on to my sanity

sections.spanish: Ven y escóndeme de esta terrible realidad...

sections.original: Dreaded memories flood back to me
sections.spanish: Recuerdos temidos inundan mi mente

sections.spanish: Está el saber que pronto desapareceremos,

sections.original: Knowing that I'll soon be gone...

sections.original: As I drift away... far away from you,

sections.original: Trying to forget tomorrow and all that's happened

sections.original: This is not the way, the way I was meant to be

sections.original: I feel, I'm seeing so clear

sections.original: Do you remember me? how we used to be?
sections.spanish: ¿Me recuerdas? ¿Cómo solíamos ser?

sections.original: do you think we should be closer?
sections.spanish: ¿Crees que deberíamos estar más cerca?

sections.original: She stood in the doorway the ghost of a smile
sections.spanish: Ella se quedó en el umbral, el fantasma de una sonrisa

sections.original: haunting her face like a cheap hotel sign
sections.spanish: perseguía su rostro como el letrero de un hotel barato

sections.original: her cold eyes imploring the men in their macs
sections.spanish: sus fríos ojos imploraban a los hombres con sus gabardinas

sections.original: for the gold in their bags or the knives in their backs
sections.spanish: por el oro en sus bolsas o los cuchillos en sus espaldas

sections.spanish: avanzando con audacia, uno extendió su mano

sections.original: he said, " I was just a child then now I'm only a man"

sections.original: By the cold and religious we were taken in hand

sections.original: shown how to feel good and told to feel bad
sections.spanish: nos mostraron cómo sentirnos bien y nos dijeron que nos sintiéramos mal

sections.original: tongue tied and terrified we learned how to pray
sections.spanish: con la lengua atada y aterrorizados aprendimos a rezar

sections.original: now our feelings run deep and cold as the clay
sections.spanish: ahora nuestros sentimientos fluyen profundos y fríos como el barro

sections.original: and strung out behind us the banners and flags
